titles.title: Department of Education Accountability Act of 2017
Department of Education Accountability Act of 2017
A bill to require reporting by the Secretary of Education on the implementation of recent Government Accountability Office recommendations.
Department of Education Accountability Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
